name: Drone Simulator 2026: A Game of Drones
name_original: Drone Simulator 2026: A Game of Drones
description:
Drone Simulator 2026: A game of drones. Experience the life of a lonely drone.

Keyboard and Mouse controls:

W and S - move forward and backward.

A and D - strafe left and right.

Space and Left Shift - move up and down.

Left Mouse (hold) - switch to drone camera mode.

Right Mouse - take a picture (while in drone camera mode)

G - Toggle ground camera mode on/off.

F - Turn drone motor on/off.

Credits
